Texts.Chs: 现在我在这里。至少直到我不再是我。值得庆幸的是，如果没有抗锯齿泯灭者，这是不可能发生的，而且还没有被发明出来。我想念什么吗？
Texts.Eng: And now I'm here. At least until I no longer am. Thankfully that can't happen without a Quintex Obliterator, and those aren't invented yet. Did I miss anything?

Texts.Chs: 您是萨特尔所说的绝对欢迎蜜蜂的新来者吗？ 你一定是，否则你为什么会在这里，对吗？
Texts.Eng: Are you that newcomer that Saunter said absolutely adores bees? You must be, or else why would you be here, right?

Texts.Chs: 很少有人能真正欣赏三明治制作的精美艺术。它需要稳定的手，敏锐的头脑和敏锐的平衡感才能创造出真正的完美烹饪。
Texts.Eng: Few can truly appreciate the fine art of sandwich making. It takes a steady hand, a sharp mind and a keen sense of balance to create true culinary perfection.

Texts.Chs: 为了面包？ 黑麦，当然。 不过，不仅黑麦。并不是杰森曾经被市场抛售的垃圾。 我是说真正的黑麦。像加尔拉一样的东西。新鲜。肉质的。
Texts.Eng: For the bread? Rye of course. Not just any rye, though. Not that garbage Jesson used to sell down by the market. I mean real Rye. Stuff like Garla always has. Fresh. Succulent.

Texts.Chs: 从那里，您需要将面包放在一边。您需要等待它，期待您的意图。 因此，现在，让我们把注意力转移到赫库尔兽上。整点它的肉。这些肉不会便宜。
Texts.Eng: From there, you need to set aside the loaf for a bit. You need to let it wait, anticipate your intentions. So for now, lets move on the the Horkulbeast. Get it fresh. It won't be cheap.

Texts.Chs: 大蒜，你问？ 真是的，那里有鸟。 我们尽力而为。我们要约4瓣丁香。在这里相信我，更何况是犯罪。放好锅，打开燃烧器并在加热时加一些油。
Texts.Eng: Garlic, you ask? Hell yes there is garlid. As much as we can muster. We want about 4 cloves. Trust me here, any less is criminal. Set a pan out, turn on your burner and add some oil while it warms.

Texts.Chs: 我放弃了那崇高的职业。我的真正兴趣在于知识和理解的道路。我甚至发明了藏在^red;草莓^reset;里的 ^cyan;杀人棍^reset;！
Texts.Eng: I gave up that noble profession, however. My true interest lay down the path of knowledge and understanding. I even invented the ^cyan;Kill-Pod^reset; in ^red;Strawberry^reset;!

Texts.Chs: 我知道这不仅是因为你^green;看上去^reset;有点愚蠢，也是因为我是一个工匠大师。对，真的。^cyan;三明治制作大师^reset;。最崇高的职业。
Texts.Eng: I know this not just because you ^green;look^reset; a little bit stupid, but also because I am a master artisan. Yes, really. A ^cyan;Master Sandwich Maker^reset;. The noblest of professions.

Texts.Chs: 就在您即将从锅中取出赫库尔兽，鸡蛋和大蒜混合物之前，请务必在交配季节像鸟一样拍打您的手臂，并像诺拉克一样尖叫。
Texts.Eng: Just before you're about to take that horkulbeast, egg and garlic medley off the burder be sure to flap your arms like a bird and screech like a norlaac in mating season.

Texts.Chs: 凯文对自己了解甚深。不要在这里质疑这个天才：接下来，我得到了一大匙反物质。 我往3盎司装苏打饼干里加了这个。
Texts.Eng: Kevin knows his stuff. Don't question the genius here: Next I got a nice spoonful of antimatter. I added that to 3 ounces of snarshed soda crackers.

Texts.Chs: 没有？ 行。^red;$#@@#%^reset;我猜。我是^green;凯文^reset;，而且我可能比你聪明得多。
Texts.Eng: No? Allright. ^red;$#@@#%^reset; it I guess. I'm ^green;Kevin^reset;, and I am probably quite a bit smarter than you are.

Texts.Chs: 没有？ 好吧...那你站在那里有点烦。骑上自行车上。滚吧。
Texts.Eng: No? Allright...you standing there is getting a bit annoying, then. On your bike. Off you go.

Texts.Chs: 现在我需要烤面包。然后，使用肉体引擎简单地将夸特障碍物化为一个简单的问题。
Texts.Eng: Now I needed to toast that bread. Then it was a simple matter of farlixxing the qualtross-barr barrier using the flesh-engine.

Texts.Chs: 有一次，我做了一个三明治，我的名字被永远铭刻在天鹅座伊格尼IV的^orange;三明治殿堂^reset;里。查一下。甚至还有一个^red;#$@%%$^reset;雕像之类的东西。
Texts.Eng: Once, I made a sandwich so amazing that my name is forever inscribed in the ^orange;Hall of Sandwiches^reset; on Cygnus Igni IV. Look it up. There's even a ^red;#$@%%$^reset; statue and stuff.

Texts.Chs: 但是肉质的差异... 这是显而易见的。我向你保证，你再也不想吃任何东西了。一旦我加入剩下的配料...嗯。
Texts.Eng: The difference in the meat quality though...that's unmistakeable. You won't ever want to eat another thing again, I promise you that. Once I add the rest of the ingredients...mmmmm.

Texts.Chs: 然后我把所有的垃圾组合起来。完美的，聪明的，会唱歌的三明治。顺便说一句，它看起来棒极了。真是令人惊讶。被吃掉时的尖叫声...就没那么好听了。
Texts.Eng: Then I combined all that crap. The perfect, sapient, singing sandwich. It looked amazing, by the way. Truly astonishing. The screams when devoured...less so.

Texts.Chs: 我们现在要把马铃薯煎一下，大约中等煎3分钟。煮的时候，把大蒜捣碎，加进去。那我们还需要一样东西。
Texts.Eng: We're going to fry the horkulbeast now, at about medium for 3 minutes a side. While it cooks, mash up the garlic and add it in. Then we just need one more thing.

Texts.Chs: 你想问什么？为什么那么明显的是爱和温柔！你要把这些东西炒3分钟，只炒一次。
Texts.Eng: What is it you ask? Why obviously thats love and tenderness! You wanna cook that stuff up for 3 mins per side, flipping only once.

Texts.Chs: ^red;你现在需要什么，杰森?!?!?^reset;哦，不是他。嗨。什么？
Texts.Eng: ^red;What do you need now, Jesson?!?!?^reset; Oh. It's not him. Hi. What?
